text: Jamie Wilson (born in 31 January 1996), is a professional football player who represents the British Virgin Islands national team. He debuted on 13 October 2018 match against Suriname in a 5-0 defeat in qualifying round of the CONCACAF Nations League. In 24 March 2019, he scored his first goal for the British Virgin Islands, however, the match ended in 1-2 defeat against non- FIFA member Bonaire. ==International career== ===International goals=== :Scores and results list the British Virgin Islands' goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
